revised_title: New Polybasic Fatty Acid Production from Glucose by Penicillium Spiculisporum
tldr: The authors discovered a new polybasic fatty acid, C17H28O6, produced by the microorganism Penicillium Spiculisporum. This fatty acid, referred to as Substance A, is a metabolic product of the species and is unique to it. The researchers describe the process of obtaining and purifying Substance A, as well as its properties and reactions with various reagents.
